long_description:
The walls are lined with bows on a rack.  Most are broken and worn down as they have not been used in a long time, except for one.  Unlike the other bows, this one gleams in the light, untarnished.  There is also an unlit lantern at the southern end of the room.

There is a door sandwiched by bow adorned walls, on the north end of the room.
short_description:
A room full of old bows, and one unique untarnished bow.
There is a door(exit) on north end.

Map.name: Map
Map.description: An old map is hanging on the wall.

Quiver.name: Quiver
Quiver.description: This quiver can be used to hold arrows.
